Node.definition: = pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to look at; hence: = action by which humans or deities pay attention to certain matters
= mass of rock projecting and forming an elevation

Node.gloss: to hew out|to dig|to cut out|to dress|to mine
Node.definition: = action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or other sharp implement, ► in order to alter its shape and so create a new object out of it
= large pit from which stones are cut

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= causative action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or other sharp implement, ► in order to alter its shape and so create a new object out of it
literally: to look at; hence: = action by which humans or deities pay attention to certain matters
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= indirect male progenitor
= woman, also known as Sarai (שָׂרַי) ► wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and mother of Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= process by which humans and animals bring forth new offspring
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

= location; ◄ in the east; ► place where God planted the garden in which he placed the first man and woman, until they were sent away; often used to denote the garden itself; ≈ associated with joy, fertility, and prosperity
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
literally: confession; hence: = action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
poetic term: = words set to music
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed
= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

Node.gloss: to go out|to go forth|to be known
Node.definition: literally: to go out; hence: = process by which certain information is becoming publicly known
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked

Node.gloss: to act in a moment|to act suddenly
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities perform an action at an unexpected moment and with speed

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: to go out; hence: = process by which an event starts taking place, originating from a certain deity, person, or place
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH

Node.gloss: to look for|to wait for|to hope for
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
to lift up (one's eye, face); hence: = action by which humans direct their face or eyes away from the ground so that they can see what is in the distance or in the sky
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= to gradually disappear from existence ◄ like a cloth that slowly wears out and finally falls apart
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= causative action by which an event is brought to an end
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
= human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality
= action by which a human being utters words that are intended to provoke shame in someone else

Node.gloss: to fear|to be afraid|to be discouraged
Node.definition: = state in which humans or animals lack inner strength and courage
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= smallish brown or gray moth that lays eggs in clothing or other cloth; eggs hatch into very small caterpillars, which feed on the fibers; ◄ Tineidae family, probably Tineola biselliella; ≈ symbols of decay, ruin, and slow destruction
= soft wavy undercoat of hairy animals such as sheep, ► used to weave a fabric from which clothing was made; ≈ associated with whiteness, purity, and softness
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= a moth (עָשׁ) in larva stage; ◄ Tineidae family; ≈ associated with destruction, damage, and ruin

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
literally: to clothe oneself; hence: = action by which humans are deities engage themselves in a certain activity
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= causative action by which deities strike an animal repeatedly with a sharp or deadly object so that it dies
= causative action by which humans or deities inflict fatal wounds on humans or animals by making a hole in their body with a sharp object
= mythical sea monster, such as behemoth (בְּהֵמֹות) and leviathan (לִוְיָתָן)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

Node.gloss: to make dry|to cause to dry up
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause a state of dryness; ► in the case of land, if this condition persists, sedentary life will become impossible
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs
= state in which an object is very large in size
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= a deep place, usually filled with water; ≈ associated with hardship
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

= causative action by which humans or deity deliver an individual or group of people from the power of someone else or from difficult circumstances, ► which usually implies that the one who performed the act of deliverance has the right to claim the ones he delivered for himself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= state in which humans feel and show great joy

literally: to overtake; hence: = process by which events that humans have been expecting or dreading finally take place, ◄ as if they had been pursuing them for some time and ultimately caught up with them
= process by which humans experience sorrow and suffering
= act by which humans make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= type of grass; ◄ plants; ► serves as food for animals; ≈ regarded as weak, vulnerable, and short lived
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
literally: to stretch out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities causes an area to be covered with something with the shape and the flexibility of a large piece of cloth
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
literally: to found; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities bring something into existence

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger

Node.gloss: to nag|to pester|to oppress|to cause distress
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to experience distress, either with words or with actions, ► usually with the purpose of forcing that person to make certain concessions
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= action where humans make themselves ready for a particular activity
= a reference to an unknown location, but focused on the (often rhetorical) question whether an event may ever take place at all, rather than with a specific location in mind
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger

Node.gloss: to nag|to pester|to oppress|to cause distress
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to experience distress, either with words or with actions, ► usually with the purpose of forcing that person to make certain concessions
= process by which an event happens without delay
= causative action by which humans and deities release a prisoner
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to lack|to be lacking|to fail|to dry up
Node.definition: = state in which humans or objects are found less in quantity or entirely absent in a location where they are supposed to be present
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative process by which a liquid mass is agitated
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea
= a ridge of water curling into an arched form between two depressions in open water
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

Node.gloss: to put in (someone's) mouth > to give (to someone) to speak
Node.definition: literally: to put in (someone's) mouth; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans the assignment to pass on a specific message to others
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
literally: to cover (someone) in the shadow of (one's) hand; hence: = causative action by which deities provide protection to humans
= action by which deities bring something into existince ◄ as if they were pitching a tent
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
literally: to found; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities bring something into existence

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= small, bowl shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= container of unknown shape and size; ► used for drinking; ≈ associated with God's anger and punishment
= small, bowl shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= causative action by which humans or deities help (other) humans or animals to journey from one place to the other by accompanying them and providing them with resources and protection whenever necessary
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to make grow|to bring up|to rear|to educate|to tend
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans take care of young plants or young humans while they undergo the natural development of increasing in size and changing physically on their way to being fully grown
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
literally: to meet; hence: = process by which a certain event starts affecting someone

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
literally: to shake (one's) head); hence: = action by which humans turn their head from one side to the other ► to express sympathy
= action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process
= state of having a lack of food for a period of time, affecting an individual for a short time or a large number of people in a geographical area for a prolonged time (as in famine)
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare

= medium sized antelope, about the size of a donkey, with long slender horns that are usually over a meter long; these horns are almost straight and slope back from the animal’s head at about thirty degrees from the perpendicular; the adults are a light fawn color with dark brown markings on the face and on the lower part of both front and back legs; the belly is white; ◄ Oryx leucoryx; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten
= net of unknown size and shape; ► used for hunting animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak to animals, humans, deities, or natural objects in anger, in order to express their displeasure and cause them to change their behavior
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= pertaining to being intoxicated ◄ as a result of having had too much alcohol; ≈ associated with large quantities

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to plead (another's cause)|to defend|to take up (another's) cause
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities resolve a conflict for their own benefit or for the benefit of (other) humans who may not be in a position to do that for themselves

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= small, bowl shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= container of unknown shape and size; ► used for drinking; ≈ associated with God's anger and punishment
= small, bowl shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= causative action by which humans or deities inflict sorrow and suffering on (other) humans
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= the rear part of the human body, especially from the neck to the bottom

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare
